tool_description: Gather information about your favorite clips.
name: Twitch Clippy
title: Twitch Clippy

api_list.name: Get Clip info
api_list.description: Get more info about a clip, including direct .mp4 links to the clip
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/clip/info/BadCoweringGoshawkHeyGuys"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/clip/info/{clipslug}"

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get top 20 clips of an User
api_list.description: Get the top 20 clips of an User
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/clip/user/twitch"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com/api/v1/clip/user/{username}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "twitch-clippy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
